net.grinder.util
Class DelayedCreationFileWriter

java.lang.Object
  java.io.Writer
      net.grinder.util.DelayedCreationFileWriter
All Implemented Interfaces:
Closeable, Flushable, Appendable
public final class DelayedCreationFileWriter
extends Writer

FileWriter that doesn't create a file until a write occurs.

Unsynchronised. In practice, each DelayedCreationFileWriter is wrapped in a PrintWriter that provides adequate synchronisation.

Author:
Philip Aston
